description: This source file contains an implementation of RSA signing functionality for an SSL/EAY cryptography module. It includes function definitions for signing data with RSA, choosing the signing method based on hash size, and some licensing and module info.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayRSASign(PVOID pDataToSign,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pSignature,PULONG pulSizeOfSignature,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Generates an RSA signature for the provided data. Selects signing method based on data hash size (MD5 or SHA1). Returns failure for unrecognized hash sizes.
